languages.text: "Экипаж ведет борьбу за живучесть судна. Ситуация зафиксирована в бортовом журнале как "Критическая". Мы с Леди Зауэрбэк временно осуществляем руководство мостиком: я организую работу технических служб, Иокаста — блюстителей. Почтенные Мастера Вокса и Инфернус-мастер отбыли в пострадавшие отсеки, чтобы лично принять командование своими людьми, но присутствуют на вокс-линии".

"The crew is running ship damage control procedures. The situation has been recorded in the ship's log as 'critical.' Mistress Sauerback and I are temporarily in charge of the bridge. I'm organising the technical staff while Jocasta musters the enforcers. The honourable Vox and Infernus Masters have departed for the affected compartments to take charge of their subordinates, but remain present on the vox-line."
languages.original_text: "Экипаж ведет борьбу за живучесть судна. Ситуация зафиксирована в бортовом журнале как "Критическая". Мы с Леди Зауэрбэк временно осуществляем руководство мостиком: я организую работу технических служб, Иокаста — блюстителей. Почтенные Мастера Вокса и Инфернус-мастер отбыли в пострадавшие отсеки, чтобы лично принять командование своими людьми, но присутствуют на вокс-линии".

traits.locale_text: "The crew is running ship damage control procedures. The situation is recorded in the ship's log as 'Critical'. Lady Sauerback and I are temporarily in charge of the bridge, I am organising the technical staff and Jocasta is mustering the enforcers. The honourable Vox and Infernus Masters have departed to the affected compartments to take charge of their men, but are present on the vox line."

"The crew is running ship damage control procedures. The situation is recorded in the ship's log as 'Critical'. Lady Sauerback and I are temporarily in charge of the bridge, I am organising the technical staff and Jocasta is mustering the enforcers. The honourable Vox and Infernus Masters have departed to the affected compartments to take charge of their men, but are present on the vox line."

I am organising the technical staff while Jocasta musters the enforcers. The honourable Vox and Infernus Masters have departed for the affected compartments to take charge of their men, but remain present on the vox line."

I am organising the technical staff while Jocasta musters the enforcers. The honourable Vox and Infernus Masters have departed for the affected compartments to take charge of their men, but remain present on the vox line."

I'm organising the technical staff while Jocasta musters the enforcers. The honourable Vox and Infernus Masters have departed for the affected compartments to take charge of their subordinates, but remain present on the vox-line."

"The crew is running ship damage control procedures. The situation has been recorded in the ship's log as 'critical.' Mistress Sauerback and I are temporarily in charge of the bridge. I'm organising the technical staff while Jocasta musters the enforcers. The honourable Vox and Infernus Masters have departed for the affected compartments to take charge of their subordinates, but remain present on the vox-line."

languages.text: «La tripulación está ejecutando los protocolos de control de daño de la nave. La situación está registrada como "crítica" en la bitácora de la nave. La maestra Sauerback y yo estamos a cargo del puente temporalmente. Estoy organizando al personal técnico mientras Jocasta dirige al de seguridad. Los honorables maestros de infernus y vocos han acudido a los compartimentos afectados para dirigir a sus subordinados, pero siguen conectados al voco».
languages.original_text: "The crew is running ship damage control procedures. The situation has been recorded in the ship's log as 'critical.' Mistress Sauerback and I are temporarily in charge of the bridge. I'm organising the technical staff while Jocasta musters the enforcers. The honourable Vox and Infernus Masters have departed for the affected compartments to take charge of their subordinates, but remain present on the vox-line."

traits.locale_text: «La tripulación está ejecutando los protocolos de control de daño de la nave. La situación está registrada como "crítica" en la bitácora de la nave. La maestra Sauerback y yo estamos a cargo del puente temporalmente. Estoy organizando al personal técnico mientras Jocasta dirige al de seguridad. Los honorables maestros de Infernus y vocos han acudido a los compartimentos afectados para dirigir a la gente, pero siguen conectados al voco».

languages.text: 「クルーは、船のダメージコントロールの手順を実行中です。船のログで状況は'危機的'と記録されています。ザウアーバック嬢と私が一時的にブリッジを持っています。私は技術スタッフをまとめ、ジョカスタはエンフォーサーを招集中です。崇高なるヴォクスとインフェルヌスのマスターは、部下を指揮しようと被害を受けた区画へ向かいましたが、ヴォクスラインに留まっています」
languages.original_text: "The crew is running ship damage control procedures. The situation has been recorded in the ship's log as 'critical.' Mistress Sauerback and I are temporarily in charge of the bridge. I'm organising the technical staff while Jocasta musters the enforcers. The honourable Vox and Infernus Masters have departed for the affected compartments to take charge of their subordinates, but remain present on the vox-line."

traits.locale_text: 「クルーは、船のダメージコントロールの手順を実行中です。船のログで状況は'危機的'と記録されています。ザウアーバック嬢と私が一時的にブリッジを持っています。私は技術スタッフをまとめ、ジョカスタはエンフォーサーを招集中です。崇高なるヴォクスとインフェルヌスのマスターは、部下を指揮しようと被害を受けた区画へ向かいましたが、ヴォクスラインに留まっています」

languages.text: “船员正在紧急运行舰船损坏控制程序。此刻，舰船日志记录的紧急程度为‘危急’。我和苏尔贝克女士目前暂时负责管理舰桥的情况。我正在组织技术人员，而约卡斯塔在召集执法者。尊敬的音阵大师与控火大师已经前往赶往受到影响的船舱，召集他们的人手，他们的音阵通讯依然在线。”
languages.original_text: "The crew is running ship damage control procedures. The situation has been recorded in the ship's log as 'critical.' Mistress Sauerback and I are temporarily in charge of the bridge. I'm organising the technical staff while Jocasta musters the enforcers. The honourable Vox and Infernus Masters have departed for the affected compartments to take charge of their subordinates, but remain present on the vox-line."

traits.locale_text: “船员正在紧急运行舰船损坏控制程序，此刻舰船日志记录的紧急程度为‘危急’。我和苏尔贝克女士目前暂时负责管理舰桥的情况。我正在组织技术人员，而约卡斯塔在召集执法者。尊敬的音阵大师与控火大师已经前往赶往受到影响的船舱，召集他们的人手，他们的音阵通讯依然在线。”

languages.text: "Die Crew führt die Prozesse zur Schadensbegrenzung auf dem Schiff aus. Die Situation wurde im Logbuch als 'kritisch' eingetragen. Meisterin Sauerback und ich haben vorübergehend das Kommando über die Brücke. Ich organisiere das technische Personal, während Jocasta die Enforcer mobilisiert. Die ehrenwerten Vox- und Infernus-Meister sind zu den betroffenen Modulen aufgebrochen, um das Kommando über ihre Untergebenen zu übernehmen, stehen jedoch über das Vox-System mit uns in Verbindung."
languages.original_text: "The crew is running ship damage control procedures. The situation has been recorded in the ship's log as 'critical.' Mistress Sauerback and I are temporarily in charge of the bridge. I'm organising the technical staff while Jocasta musters the enforcers. The honourable Vox and Infernus Masters have departed for the affected compartments to take charge of their subordinates, but remain present on the vox-line."

traits.locale_text: "Die Crew führt die Prozesse zur Schadensbegrenzung auf dem Schiff aus. Die Situation wurde im Logbuch als 'kritisch' eingetragen. Herrin Sauerback und ich haben vorübergehend das Kommando über die Brücke. Ich organisiere das technische Personal, während Jocasta die Enforcers mobilisiert. Die ehrenwerten Vox- und Infernus-Meister sind zu den betroffenen Modulen aufgebrachen, um das Kommando über ihre Männer zu übernehmen, stehen jedoch über das Vox-System mit uns in Verbindung."

languages.text: « L'équipage met en œuvre les procédures de contrôle des avaries du vaisseau. Le journal de bord définit la situation comme critique. Maîtresse Sauerback et moi-même sommes temporairement en charge de la passerelle. De mon côté, j'organise le personnel technique, tandis que Jocasta rassemble les prévôts. La maîtresse-vox et le maître-infernus se rendent aux compartiments affectés pour rejoindre leurs subordonnés, mais restent joignables par ligne-vox. »
languages.original_text: "The crew is running ship damage control procedures. The situation has been recorded in the ship's log as 'critical.' Mistress Sauerback and I are temporarily in charge of the bridge. I'm organising the technical staff while Jocasta musters the enforcers. The honourable Vox and Infernus Masters have departed for the affected compartments to take charge of their subordinates, but remain present on the vox-line."

traits.locale_text: « L'équipage met en œuvre les procédures de contrôle des avaries du vaisseau. Le journal de bord définit la situation comme critique. Maîtresse Sauerback et moi-même sommes temporairement en charge de la passerelle. De mon côté, j'organise le personnel technique, tandis que Jocasta rassemble les prévôts. La maîtresse-vox et le maître-infernus se rendent aux compartiments affectés pour rejoindre leurs hommes, mais restent joignables par ligne-vox. »

languages.text: "Mürettebat, geminin hasar kontrol prosedürlerini uyguluyor. İçinde bulunduğumuz durum, gemi kayıtlarına 'kritik' olarak geçmiş durumda. Sauerback Hanım ve ben geçici olarak köprüde yetkiyi elimize aldık. Ben teknik personeli organize ederken Jocasta da infazcıları işe koşuyor. Değerli Voks ve İtfa Üstatları, astlarının kontrolüne geçmek üzere etkilenen kompartımanlara gitti ancak voks hattından kendilerine ulaşmak mümkün."
languages.original_text: "The crew is running ship damage control procedures. The situation has been recorded in the ship's log as 'critical.' Mistress Sauerback and I are temporarily in charge of the bridge. I'm organising the technical staff while Jocasta musters the enforcers. The honourable Vox and Infernus Masters have departed for the affected compartments to take charge of their subordinates, but remain present on the vox-line."
